titles.title: Relating to the disapproval of the proposed export to the Government of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia of certain defense articles.
Relating to the disapproval of the proposed export to the Government of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia of certain defense articles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
This joint resolution prohibits the issuance of a license for the following proposed exports to the government of Saudi Arabia:
the transfer of certain technical data, hardware, and defense services to the Royal Saudi Air Force and Boeing Saudi Arabia to support the deployment of the Joint Direct Attack Munition off Saudi Arabia's western made aircraft platforms; the transfer of certain technical data, hardware, and defense services to the Royal Saudi Air Force to support the integration of the FMU-152A/B JPB Fuze System into the MK-80, BLU-109, and BLU-100 series warhead family of weapons; and the transfer of defense articles, defense services, and technical data to support the Paveway II and III, Enhanced Paveway II and III, and Paveway IV Weapons Systems for the Royal Saudi Air Force F-15, Tornado, and Typhoon Aircraft.
